text: @travis_view “Arrest Bill Gates”? Many of you all should probably return home, shelter in place, then“pretend” that COVID-19 is a serious, worldwide crisis, and that by staying home and NOT spraying your opinion-filled saliva in close proximity to others, you are REALLY helping. Please.
